price: 43. Ye nde azali kosambela тропа bino(1) ye na ba anzelu naye mpo ete abimisa bino na molili atia bino na bongengi. Mpe azali na ngolu mpenza тропа bandimi.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُصَلِّي عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتُهُۥ لِيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَكَانَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رَحِيمٗا
footnotes: 1 Kosambela тропа bino: Losambo ya Allah elakisi: Koyokela bino "Mawa" mpe ya ba anzelu ezali nde kosengela bino "Bolimbisi".

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yuṣallī ʿalaykum wamalāikatuhu liyukh'rijakum mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri wakāna bil-mu'minīna raḥīman
translations: so that He may bring you out
